answers.answer: Sounds like low iron or blood pressure,  could possibly be dehydration, are you drinking enough water?  I get dehydrated really bad.
I thought it was dehydration as well so I have been drinking more but it doesnt seem to help, but maybe its still not enough
It could also be a sign of preeclampsia.. I would get checked out as soon as you can.

question: Is it ok to feel light headed just sitting at work? My hands feel swollen and my arms get tingly and for a few hours at a time I will get dizzy. Is this a sign of something bad?? Im 37 + 2 weeks. I go to see my doctor on monday but just wondering if I should go get checked or just wait it out cause baby still moves around
title: dizzy/light headed
